listitem.para: YALI, the installer of Pardus, gained system rescue menu that provides easy bootloader and password recovery.
Some of the core components are now parallellized to increase the utilization of multi-core machines which means faster package operations and better package management experience.
QuickFormat is a removable device formatting tool that can integrate to Dolphin. Now, it's very easy to format USB flash drives and card readers.
Kernel - The Linux kernel shipped with Pardus &PRODVER; is &KERNELVER;.
Plymouth - The bootsplash technology used in Pardus &PREVVER; is updated to its latest version for a much stable experience.
TeX Live - TeX Live documentation stack is updated to latest &TEXLIVEVER; version.

section.title: Changes in KDE Desktop Environment
section.para: Pardus &PRODVER; comes with the latest KDE Software Compilation, KDE SC &KDEVER;. The base packages also contains numerous backports and fixes which will improve the stability of your desktop experience significantly.

KDE Software Compilation, versioned &KDEVER;, provide many new features in each of KDE's components including Plasma, Solid, Nepomuk, KWin and also introduces a brand new Bluetooth framework called BlueDevil allows easy device pairing and management.

section.title: Mozilla Firefox
section.para: Pardus &PRODVER; comes with Mozilla Firefox &FIREFOXVER; as the default web browser application. This version of Firefox introduces CSS animations, Do-Not-Track, improved support for HTML5, MathML, and SMIL, improved network, memory and JavaScript performance and fixes for several stability and security issues.

section.title: Clementine
section.para: Clementine, a cross-platform music player based on Amarok 1.4 is updated to latest stability and maintenance version &CLEMENTINEVER;.

section.title: SMPlayer
section.para: SMplayer, a Qt based frontend for MPlayer is set as the default Video/VCD/DVD playing application as it is well integrated with KDE desktop environment in terms of usability and graphical user interface and supports playing a wide range of video file types thanks to the MPlayer backend.

section.title: KsCD
section.para: KsCD, is set as the default Audio CD playing application.

section.title: Web Browsers
section.para: Although not included in the installation images, a wide range of web browsers including Chromium browser, rekonq, Arora and Opera are available for installation through the package manager.

section.title: System Settings
section.para: The display configuration tool of the graphics card manufacturer is now recommended in the Display and Monitor module of the System Settings, if it suits better to your graphics card driver.

section.title: Office Suite
section.para: LibreOffice, an Open Source personal productivity suite sponsored by the Document Foundation, is the default Office Suite in Pardus &PRODVER;. &LIBREOFFICEVER; version of LibreOffice introduces; improved text rendering, configurable color charts, improved thumbnailed HTML export of presentations, faster Flat ODF import/export and better desktop theme integration.

section.title: Other
section.para: Most wanted packages like Skype, a P2P VoIP client that allows you to make voice calls, and Wine, a software that allows you to run Microsoft Windows applications, are now included in Pardus &PRODVER; package repopsitories.
